column1: Kata Robata////Came for another unforgettable Omakase experience and was not disappointed. Chef really outdid himself. Dining at Kata Robata is my favorite date night. The staff are all warm and welcoming
column3: the food is excellent and unique
column4: the atmosphere is fun and inviting... everything at Kata is 5 stars without being snobby and uncomfortable. Not to mention the food is just mouthwatering delicious. Life changing sushi! Kata has ruined me for other sushi places
column5: they have set the bar so high!
